title: Baker Ross AV535 A4 Rainbow Coloured Card (220gsm), Perfect for Children's Art & Craft Activities, Collages, Model Making and More (Pack of 50), Assorted
features: Coloured Card Sheets: This multipack contains blank card sheets, that are ideal for a range of arts and crafts projects. Use these multicoloured sheets for card making, scrapbooking, origami, displays, and many more craft applications

Card for Crafts: This value pack of card is perfect for crafting at home, at school, and in the classroom. These vibrant all-purpose sheets are perfect for creative kids and adults to use for a range of handicrafts
Craft Supply Essentials: Sheets can also be cut, folded, painted, drawn on, glued and torn, to create colourful artwork, creative projects and crafty models
Included in the Pack: This pack contains 50 sheets of bright coloured A4 card. Colours include; red, yellow, pink, green, orange, purple and blue. Card weight 220gsm. A4 Card measures 21 x 29.7 cm

Made by Experts: Baker Ross has been designing and providing art and craft supplies, and toys to schools, groups and parents for over 40 years. All products conform to General Product Safety Regulations, and state age recommendation where applicable.
description: From the manufacturer Rainbow Craft Essentials Decorate your crafts in a range of rainbow colours! Baker Ross has a great range of crafting materials including pom poms, stickers, gems, beads and more! Get Creative These versatile craft supplies are perfect for decorating Baker Ross card and wood blanks (not included). Creative kids will enjoy making their own designs and patterns with these colourful craft supplies Rainbow Crafting Baker Ross rainbow craft materials are perfect for embellishing colourful craft projects. Add these embellishments to your cards, presents, decorations and more!
